title: AU Small Finance Bank ties up with Tata Motors for its passenger vehicles finance solutions - Moneycontrol
content: AU Small Finance Bank ties up with Tata Motors for its passenger vehicles finance solutions  Moneycontrol
description: The offer will be applicable to a spectrum of customers like salaried, self-employed professionals, self-employed non-professionals, agriculture and dairy farmers, etc., including new to credit customers. Customers can also apply for a car loan via the AU 0101 app to avail of the pre-approved offers.
